bibl.title: Scribal Habits in Early Greek New Testament Papyri. Papers from the 2008 SBL Panel Review Session.
bibl.note: Papers from a panel review session held at the 2008 SBL meeting in Boston on: James R. Royse, Scribal Habits in Early Greek New Testament Papyri = New Testament Tools, Studies and Documents. 36 (Leiden - Boston, 2008). - 1. Review by Juan Hernández Jr: Introduction; - Dissertation Work at Emory: Search for a Project & Method; - The Quest for Exemplars: Promise and Limitations; - Discovering Royse; - The Dissertation - an Expansion of Colwell; - Transparency and Imitative Quality; - Application to the Apocalypse; - Royse2: the 2007 Monograph; - Conclusion. - 2. Review by Peter M. Head: Introduction; - General Introduction and Summary; - Comparison between Book and Dissertation; - Focus on P66 [P. Bodmer 2 (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777)]; - Concluding Comments. - 3. Review by Dirk Jongkind: Royse on Barbara Aland: Singular Readings which Are Part of an Isolated Tradition; - Royse on Klaus Junack: How Are the Papyri Copied?; - Royse and Griesbach: The Shorter Reading? - 4. Response by James R. Royse.

bibl.title: TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism

bibl.seg: Juan Hernández Jr., Peter M. Head, Dirk Jongkind & James R. Royse, Scribal Habits in Early Greek New Testament Papyri. Papers from the 2008 SBL Panel Review Session.
TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 17 (2012) 22 pp.

Papers from a panel review session held at the 2008 SBL meeting in Boston on: James R. Royse, Scribal Habits in Early Greek New Testament Papyri = New Testament Tools, Studies and Documents. 36 (Leiden - Boston, 2008). - 1. Review by Juan Hernández Jr: Introduction; - Dissertation Work at Emory: Search for a Project & Method; - The Quest for Exemplars: Promise and Limitations; - Discovering Royse; - The Dissertation - an Expansion of Colwell; - Transparency and Imitative Quality; - Application to the Apocalypse; - Royse2: the 2007 Monograph; - Conclusion. - 2. Review by Peter M. Head: Introduction; - General Introduction and Summary; - Comparison between Book and Dissertation; - Focus on P66 [P. Bodmer 2 (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777)]; - Concluding Comments. - 3. Review by Dirk Jongkind: Royse on Barbara Aland: Singular Readings which Are Part of an Isolated Tradition; - Royse on Klaus Junack: How Are the Papyri Copied?; - Royse and Griesbach: The Shorter Reading? - 4. Response by James R. Royse.
